content:
What a lovely touch! A heartfelt card with a sweet message will make the gift even more special and personal.

Here are some ideas for congratulatory messages you could write in the card:

1. "Congratulations on the royal arrival of Princess Olivia! Wishing you all the joy, love, and sleep (when you can get it) as you embark on this amazing journey."
2. "Welcome to the world, little Olivia! You're already loved beyond measure. Congratulations to Lisa and your growing family on this precious new addition."
3. "Wishing you a lifetime of snuggles, giggles, and adventure with your little princess, Olivia. Congratulations on this incredible blessing!"
4. "Lisa, you're going to be an amazing mom! Congratulations on the arrival of your sweet baby girl, Olivia. Enjoy every moment (even the sleepless nights)."
5. "Olivia, you're already bringing so much joy to the world! Congratulations to Lisa and your family on this precious new addition. Wishing you all love, happiness, and harmony."

Remember to keep the message personal and sincere, and feel free to add your own touch and style. You could also include a funny or relatable quote about parenthood, if that fits your relationship with Lisa.

The card will be a wonderful way to express your congratulations and well-wishes to Lisa and her family, and it will make the gift basket even more special and memorable.
